name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr Hyde: The Good Game
name_original: Dr. Jekyll and Mr Hyde: The Good Game
description:
This was part of my one-game-a-month challenge almost a decade ago. It is a remake of the infamous NES game "Dr. Jekyll and Mr Hyde"

Take on the role of the good Doctor Jekyll as he walks to his wedding. But the universe conspires against him and it doesn't take much stress to unleash the evil Mr. Hyde from the dark recesses of his mind.
